summary: This module implements the FeatureView class, which encapsulates the definition and configuration of a logical collection of features in Feast. It ties together a data source, associated entities, feature schema, TTL, materialization intervals, and metadata, and provides validation, protobuf serialization, and projection capabilities.
business_intent: Allow developers to declare, validate, and manage feature views in a Feast feature store, enabling consistent feature engineering, storage, and serving for machineâ€‘learning models.
